hello: I'm Hs OR Call me Herbert
description: Graduated from Simon Fraser University with a MSc in Applied Mathematics. I am currently a full stack engineer at PwC AC Shanghai. As a full stack engineer, I have profound experience in rapid prototyping, practical problems solving, and strong learning capabilities. Be curious and fresh about any software technology that solves problems and accomplishes goals.
